modName: Miin Fal Grah - The Eye Of The Battle
summary: Simply a new weapon. Check it out, it's my first weapon mod!
descriptionHtml:
This is my first weapon mod.
I made it for my own, but then I thought, why not show the weapon to the community...

So don't expect something special, it's just a old sword with some new effects:

- The sword absorbs the health from your enemies (pretty much and over 3 seconds long)

- The speed from the sword is also encrased from 1.0 to 1.4

- Damage: 84


You can find the Sword near the "forever green grove" (look at the map below)


Thanks for downloading :)
author: SilentRider
